model.dao

Class BillingDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.dao.BillingDAO

  • public class BillingDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    A BillingDAO data access object contains the different queries related to the Billing and Collection module to access the tables in the database.
    Since:
    2017-10-28
